Title: Well maintained stadium
Review: Visited the stadium while on the way from Hazratganj to Chowk. The stadium is mainly used for state level games and is well maintained. Not much to see there but if have some extra time then only visit.

Name: Rohit T
Title: Lucknow's epic stadium
Review: Named after hockey wizard KD Singh Babu, this stadium has witnessed quite a few hockey matches and Sheesh mahal cricket and is the training ground for youngsters. These days the entrance is in a mess due to metro construction

Name: Susej B
Title: One of The Oldest Sports Stadium at Lucknow
Review: The stadia is having a grass turf and a multi pitch including athletics, hockey, football, handball and cricket pitches a basketball court too inside the stadium.Outside the stadium premises are various other sports pitches and grounds like Tennis, Volleyball, Basketball etc with a roller skating rink.There also exists a Badminton hall and an Olympic sized Swimming pool.This however is not a tourist spot in any way !

Name: Rasheedur Rahman Shihab
Title: Nice One
Review: K. D. Singh Babu Stadium is one of the very few sports stadiums in Uttar Pradesh's Capital. It is also a famous landmark in Lucknow.

Name: Sandeep V
Title: Great
Review: The stadium was established in 1957 and it is located near the busy Hazratganj area of downtown Lucknow, in the heart of the city. it has a seating capacity of 25,000 and does not support floodlights for day night matches. The stadium is also the home ground for UP Cricket Team.[4] The stadium hosts domestic competitions regularly. Several International and national field hockey matches have been played here, now stadium is also used for domestic and few international cricket matches. The stadium is also sometimes used for association football games, like the District Football League matches of Lucknow. In 2012, the tournament was won by Sahara FC after defeating White Eagle Club. UP Policeand Sunrise Club made it to the semi-finals that year, at the Dilkusha Grounds.

Name: sun_abhay
Title: OLDEST SPORT STADIUM OF LUCKNOW CITY
Review: Located in heart of city , the stadium is an iconic structure named after legendry hockey player Late  Sri K D Singh Babu ji, though it is a place of all kind of sports facilities but having poor maintenance and criticised for political interference and poor management.

Name: PD1059
Title: went to register my son in basketball in KDS Babu stadium
Review: The staff is very cooperative and fee etc was deposited in SBI bank nearby. The coach Madam was extremely nice and was constantly working with players to improve their game. We nee many more stadiums in Lucknow like this

Title: Visit toK.D.Singh Babu Stadium, Lucknow
Review: This stadium is the oldest sports complex of Lucknow situate in Hazratganj. National and International events are being organized  round the year.

Review: This is a very old place which of the name of KD Singh Babu Stadium authorised by UP government. This is having all type of sports like swimming , cricket,basketball, table tennis and etc

Review: Love to play cricket here and love to watch football and other games. This is a good stadium for cricket lovers.

Name: Rohit C
Title: oldest stadium of city
Review: it is the oldest stadium of the city named after famous hockey player K D Singh Babu. it has honored for the training of players like Mohd. Kaif and others. it has all sport lovers felicities but need more focus of Govt or other bodies for development

Name: kalpajeetbhattachary
Title: K. D. Singh Babu Stadium, Lucknow
Review: K.D. Singh ‘Babu’ Stadium is named after the legendry hockey Olimpian K. D. Singh. He is known among sports persons as Babu saab.  This is the main stadium of Lucknow located in the heart of city near Hazratganj and very near to the banks of Gomti river. An  one stop place for sportsmen & sports lovers of the city. This stadium is famous for hosting international Hockey Matches &  the famous All India Sheesh Mahal Trophy & Sir Frank Worrel Trophy for cricket also. It’s a beautiful stadium with a capacity of around 25000 spectators.

Name: sujatapant
Title: good stadium ,better maintenance would help
Review: this stadium is named after the famed hockey player sh.k.d.singh .now it is a good center for hockey,cricket,swimming,t.t,kickboxing,and for training in physical fitness .parking is available .wish it was better kept.

Review: Only once I have visited in side the stadium. frankly very big ground in the mid of City. however, lot of improvement expected from ground staff.

Name: SANDEEP24886
Title: Once a renowned stadium, now needs maintenance to get it built for national stature.
Review: K.D.Singh Babu Stadium is one of the oldest stadiums in Lucknow. Located beside Parivartan Chowk, many schools organize their Annual Sports Day now here. Apart from the cricket practice section, there are other sections such as Swimming Pool, Badminton and Table Tennis section which I have been to in this stadium.Needs maintenance from the government to get it built for national stature.

Name: prabhakarbaba
Title: No renowned sports held in KD SBS
Review: K D singh babu stadium is only for sports activity there is no renowned sports held in my knowledge I

Name: Bobby Ramakant
Title: All season Pool not functional in August!
Review: I have learnt swimming recently and was scouting for a swimming pool, preferably an all season one. In Lucknow (as per internet search results) could zero in on two all season pools: one of them was reserved for bureaucrats and the other one was at KD Singh Babu Stadium. An old news of few years back published in The Times of India also verified the huge investment that government made in this all season pool. But when I went there was so disappointed, so frustrated. In the month of August, it was not functional, there was no water in the pool, only little scum towards the deep end. The washrooms or change rooms were aweful too. Huge disappointment indeed and such a sorry state of affairs of public facilities

Name: ABDUL2512
Title: Visited the  place to see if there is an ogoing event.But unfortunately, could not attend.
Review: Biggest Stadium of the city.dedicated to cricket particularly.Ranji matches are also held in this stadium.

Title: A good stadium but not properly utilised
Review: K.D Babu Stadium is quite old with international standards but very few international events has take place, Last cricket test match was between India and Srilanka that to long back under the captainship of KapilDev.I think Govt should promote more international events in various sport disciplines, it is situated in the heart of the city, Hope to see some good sports in near future.

Name: AnilBabita
Title: Landmark place
Review: There is nothing to rave & rant about the place. This is named after the famous hockey player K. D. Singh. The stadium was established in 1957 and is located near the Hazratganj,in the heart of the city. it does not support floodlights for day night matches. its one of the places in Lucknow where the sports events were organized some time back. They do it now as well.  This place has hosted a Test Match( India Vs Sri Lanka) & an ODI match.

Name: Amit0012
Title: Famous Stadium with huge ground
Review: This is one of the famous stadium of the city. Located in the heart of the City. The stadium itself has given many successful players. Best place to go and learn by the highly expert trainers. Huge variety of outdoor games are available here.

Name: Mrinal Gautam
Title: Glory Lost....
Review: Named after famous Hockey player of India Shri K.D. Singh this stadium has seen some of the best and proud moments of this city. Once it was glory of lucknow, as its located in center of the city hence it was used for almost all and every sports lover of this city but those were the days. One time it use to hold Test matches and One day matches of international level but now sister city of lucknow i.e. Kanpur is preferred over this. Hope this government as it has done for Green park the same can be done for Lucknow's K.D. Singh babu Stadium.

Name: AmitYadav007
Title: The central Stadium
Review: The stadium built in the center area of lucknow is named after the famous hockey player, Shri KD Babu. I wish it was better kept than its current state. Enjoy local breakfast around the stadium.

Name: navneetsinha
Title: A stadium for sports enthusiasts..!!!
Review: A stadium for indoor as well as outdoor activities for sports enthusiast,I first visited this stadiam during Sheesh Mahal Summer Cricket Tournament,many state and national level players are the product of this stadium.

Name: Mohitdhir1981
Title: Good stadium
Review: Good place for morning walkers and runner to exercise.Need to be further maintained so that can host international matches and lucknow people can enjoy it

Name: ApurbaRoy
Title: stadium
Review: A stadium located in the heart of the city, near Hazarat Ganj. It provides good opportunity for sport persons to play there. Hockey is mainly played internationally here

Name: jdagarwal
Title: Going Strong !
Review: A medium size stadium located in the heart of the city has been there for many years and provides good opportunity for sport enthusiasts to watch matches and also play there as well in the lean season. Facilities are a bit antiquated and hence it does not attract top notch matches. Sports complex surrounding it has come up well for other sports like Badminton, TT, Boxing, Swimming Hand Ball etc.

Name: prevas
Title: I play too...
Review: I managed to get a membership for playing badminton in the mornings whenever I travel.  I play to my hearts content.  Not everyone is offered.  But have to go through proper channel..
